lines.text: There are three of them, and Alleline.
What are you going to do about it?
Depends on "it". I'll wait for "it" to show itself.
Got a rabbit to pull out of your hat, Percy? You've got that Britain-can-make-it look about you. Very intimidating.
[Lacon has arrived late for a conference]
I'm sorry. Traffic. I should've walked.
I think you and Percy between you are contriving to keep me off the streets.
